class/id that wraps the elements with tooltip/popover.\n     Include the data-[] attribute in each element that needs it.\n     */\n    $(document).ready(function () {\n\n        $('[data-toggle                                                             = \"popover\"]').popover({\n            html: true\n        });\n\n        $('body').on('click', function (e) {\n            $('[data-toggle                                                         = \"popover\"]').each(function () {\n                //the 'is' for buttons that trigger popups\n                //the 'has' for icons within a button that triggers a popup\n                if (!$(this).is(e.target) && $(this).has(e.target).length === 0 && $('.popover').has(e.target).length === 0) {\n                    $(this).popover('hide');\n                }\n                html                                                                : true\n            });\n        });\n        $('.search').hover(function () {\n            $('.search-form').focus();\n        })\n    });\n</script>\n<!--Actualizacion Navegador-->\n\n<script>\n    var $buoop = {\n        vs: {i: 9, f: 25, o: 12.1, s: 7}, c: 2,\n        text: \"Para    function $buo_f() {\n        var e = document.createElement(\"script\");\n        e.src = \"/static/js/update.min.js\";\n        document.body.appendChild(e);\n    }\n    ;\n    try {\n 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';\n        var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];\n        s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);\n    })();\n\n</script>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n    if (typeof jQuery != 'undefined') {\n        jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {\n            var filetypes = /\\.(zip|exe|dmg|pdf|doc.*|xls.*|ppt.*|mp3|txt|rar|wma|mov|avi|wmv|flv|wav|html)$/i;\n            var baseHref = '';\n            if (jQuery('base').attr('href') != undefined) baseHref = jQuery('base').attr('href');\n\n            jQuery('a').on('click', function (event) {\n                var el = jQuery(this);\n                var track = true;\n                var href = (typeof(el.attr('href')) != 'undefined' ) ? el.attr('href') : \"\";\n                var isThisDomain = href.match(document.domain.split('.').reverse()[1] + '.' + document.domain.split('.').reverse()[0]);\n                if (!href.match(/^javascript:/i)) {\n                    var elEv = [];\n                    elEv.value = 0, elEv.non_i = false;\n                    if (href.match(/^mailto\\:/i)) {\n                        elEv.category = \"email\";\n                        elEv.action = \"click\";\n                        elEv.label = href.replace(/^mailto\\:/i, '');\n                        elEv.loc = href;\n                    }\n                    else if (href.match(filetypes)) {\n                        var extension = (/[.]/.exec(href)) ? /[^.]+$/.exec(href) : undefined;\n                        elEv.category = \"download\";\n                        \n                            elEv.action = \"portada_en_corp_\";\n                        \n                        elEv.label = href.replace(/ /g, \"-\");\n                        elEv.loc = baseHref + href;\n                    }\n\n                    else if (href.match(/^https?\\:/i) && !isThisDomain) {\n                        elEv.category = \"external\";\n                        elEv.action = \"click\";\n                        elEv.label = href.replace(/^https?\\:\\/\\//i, '');\n                        elEv.non_i = true;\n                        elEv.loc = href;\n                    }\n                    else if (href.match(/^tel\\:/i)) {\n                        elEv.category = \"telephone\";\n                        elEv.action = \"click\";\n                        elEv.label = href.replace(/^tel\\:/i, '');\n                        elEv.loc = href;\n                    }\n                    else track = false;\n\n                    if (track) {\n                        _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', elEv.category.toLowerCase(), elEv.action.toLowerCase(), elEv.label.toLowerCase(), elEv.value, elEv.non_i]);\n                        if (el.attr('target') == undefined || el.attr('target').toLowerCase() != '_blank') {\n                            setTimeout(function () {\n                                location.href = elEv.loc;\n                            }, 400);\n                            return false;\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        });\n    }\n</script>\n<!--[if lt IE 9]>\n    <script src=\"/static/js/html5shiv.js\"></script>\n    <script src=\"/static/js/respond.min.js\"></script>\n    <![endif]-->\n\n    <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n
